page.title: 19Events
page.content: Local events which are extremely well supported and enjoyed are :The Earlswood Methodist Church Fete, held every year on the first Saturday in July.This year is the 32nd Grand Fete, providing fun for all the family with sideshows, dancing and keep fit displays, musical interludes by bands, competitions, donkey rides, stalls of home made garments, books, white elephants, home made cakes and jams, cheese from Earlswood (Fowlers) and refreshments. The Tidbury Green School Fete which has really become a village fete is held annually in June having a similar programme of activities.The Bonfire and fireworks display held in November and arranged by the Social Committee of the Residents Association is now being organized by the school as from November 1985.
